title: Awesome NOPA Remodeled 1bd w/ Deck! Must See! ~ J.Wavro
map_address: Golden Gate Avenue near Divisadero Street
posting_body: San Francisco - Alamo Square/NOPA - Apartment for rent
This amazing remodeled 1 bedroom apartment is located in trendy NOPA/Alamo Square.
A Walkers Paradise - you will love grabbing breakfast at Brenda's or Eddie's Cafe, grocery shopping at Bi-Right or heading to the Divisadero Farmers Market!
Alamo Square Park is only a few blocks away.
Conveniently located near the Google and Apple Shuttle stops.
~  First floor backside corner apartment in a small 3 story walk-up building
~  Period details throughout with modern upgrades
~  Brand new refinished hardwood floors, tiled bath
~  Remodeled kitchen with stainless steel appliances featuring gas stove and custom counter-top and cabinets
~  Living room and dining area right off of the kitchen
~  Large bedroom with closet and bay windows
Available nowThis is a non-smoking unit.
Service or support animals which are necessary due to disability will be allowed.
Golden Gate Avenue & Divisadero Street, San Francisco, California

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
